basics.name: Michael Rogers
basics.summary: Military veteran transitioning to data science with a solid foundation in analytical leadership, project management, and advanced education in computer science. Eager to leverage extensive experience in intelligence and surveillance to foster impactful data-driven solutions.

education.institution: Community College of the Air Force

work.name: University of Hawai‘i at Mānoa
work.summary: Contributed to SAGE3 project, focusing on real-time data analysis and AI/ML workflows. Led NLP innovation for taxonomy automation.
highlights: Algorithm Development: Contributed over 10,000 lines of code for SAGE3’s scalable backend.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Cultivated strategic alliances with FDA, NGA, Army, and Air Force Research Labs.
Data-Driven Decision Making: Directed virtual reality-based cyber operations tool development, securing a top innovation award.

work.name: CACI International, Inc.
work.summary: Enhanced eLearning experiences through digitization and innovative learning solutions.
highlights: Coursework Digitization: Migrated instructional materials to Blackboard.
Automated Systems: Implemented automated grading for efficient language skill assessment.

work.name: The Garrett Group
work.summary: Led strategic development and coordination of ISR operations to optimize resource allocation and support decision-making at the United States Indo-Pacific Command.
highlights: Data-Driven Strategy: Optimized ISR resource allocation, enhancing operational efficiency across global intelligence capabilities.
Technological Integration: Strengthened data interoperability with cutting-edge software, significantly improving data collection and intelligence dissemination.
Crisis Response: Provided expert analysis and recommendations during critical situations, supporting high-pressure decision-making environments.
Informative Briefing: Specialized in transforming complex intelligence data into actionable insights for high-ranking officials and government decision-makers.

work.name: United States Air Force
work.summary: Concluded a distinguished 20-year career across various capacities, culminating in leadership roles in intelligence analysis and strategic planning.
highlights: Analytical Leadership: Led all-source analysis teams, producing strategic intelligence products that influenced regional security policies.
Data Science Innovation: Enhanced machine learning model training and developed methodologies to extract critical data points from complex datasets.
Quality Assurance: Implemented quality review protocols, significantly elevating the accuracy and reliability of intelligence reporting.
Event Reconstruction: Developed methodologies for processing structured and unstructured data, successfully reconstructing over 1,000 critical events.

projects.name: Deep Taxonomy Project
projects.description: Automated extraction of keywords from unstructured text using Python, BERT, and PyTorch.
highlights: Advanced the structuring of scientific data for improved knowledge management.

projects.name: Bioinformatics Research
projects.description: Analyzed SARS-CoV-2 genome, employing PCA and k-means clustering for genomic classification.
highlights: Uncovered significant insights into virus lineage and adaptability.
